thread.title: Kuyt grabs hat trick as Feyenoord beats Heerenveen 5-2
thread.title_full: Kuyt grabs hat trick as Feyenoord beats Heerenveen 5-2 | Boston Herald

author: Associated Press
title: Kuyt grabs hat trick as Feyenoord beats Heerenveen 5-2
text:
AMSTERDAM â€” Former Netherlands international Dirk Kuyt scored a first-half hat trick as Feyenoord thrashed struggling Heerenveen 5-2 on Sunday to move level on points with Eredivisie leader Ajax.
Michiel Kramer and Simon Gustafson also netted as Feyenoord rushed to a 5-0 halftime lead at the Abe Lenstra stadium before easing off after the break and conceding twice.
Ajax stayed top on goal difference after beating Heracles Almelo 2-0 on Saturday thanks to first-half goals from winger Anwar El Ghazi and midfielder Nemanja Gudelj. A win for Almelo would have seen it overtake Ajax and go top of the league.
Defending champion PSV Eindhoven is third after conceding an injury time equalizer in a 1-1 draw with Excelsior Rotterdam.
